content.rendered: Olson Brooksby is a boutique litigation firm serving Oregon and Washington. The firm represents individuals and companies throughout the U.S. and abroad who rely on our trial expertise and familiarity with the laws and court procedures of the Pacific Northwest. They have experience serving as both lead trial counsel and local counsel in complex and high-exposure lawsuits in Oregon and Washington. Their clients include large corporations as well as individuals.
